# Manthan Ankolekar's Portfolio

> Personal portfolio website of Manthan Ankolekar, a full-stack developer with 2+ years of professional experience specializing in Angular, Node.js, and MEAN stack development. Based in Karnataka, India.

## About

I'm a Software Engineer with expertise in full-stack web development. I graduated with a B.E. in Computer Science from Sahyadri College of Engineering & Management and have professional experience working at companies like Senwell Group, Blackcoffer, and AppiVa Software. I'm passionate about building practical applications and continuously learning new technologies.

**Key Technologies**: Angular, Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, MongoDB, MySQL, Firebase, AWS, Python

**Current Role**: Software Developer at Senwell Group Pvt Ltd (Oct 2024 - Present)

## Professional Experience

- [Resume](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Ba40AaV2Ol5hueeVe5wCI1GeBEtcPJXp3mzm-HZ6BHk/edit?usp=sharing): Complete professional resume with detailed work experience
- [LinkedIn Profile](https://www.linkedin.com/in/manthanank): Professional networking profile with career history

## Portfolio Sections

- [About Me](/#about): Professional background and introduction
- [Experience](/#experience): Detailed work experience timeline
- [Projects](/#projects): Showcase of personal and professional projects
- [Skills](/#about): Technical skills and proficiency levels
- [Contact](/#contact): Contact information and social media links

## Projects

- [Netflix Clone](https://github.com/manthanank/netflix-clone): React-based streaming platform clone with TMDB API integration
- [COVID-19 Tracker](https://github.com/manthanank/covid19-tracker): Angular application for tracking COVID-19 statistics
- [Weather Apps](https://github.com/manthanank/weather-app-angular): Multiple weather applications built with Angular and PWA technologies
- [Full-Stack Blog App](https://github.com/manthanank/blog-app): Complete blogging platform with MEAN stack
- [URL Shortener](https://github.com/manthanank/url-shortener): URL shortening service application
- [Expense Tracker](https://github.com/manthanank/expense-tracker): Personal finance management application
